title: India
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 376 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 560L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Y
description: India provides students with a glimpse into this unique and interesting country. From the jungles and deserts of India to the crowded cities and colorful celebrations, students will discover what makes this country special.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
